lead_paragraph: Bundesliga basement side Schalke 04 slumped to a fifth straight defeat when they lost 2-1 at Hoffenheim on Sunday as one of Germany's biggest clubs made their worst start to a season.

headline.print_headline: Schalke Slump to Fifth Straight Defeat of the Season
headline.main: Schalke Slump to Fifth Straight Defeat of the Season

snippet: Bundesliga basement side Schalke 04 slumped to a fifth straight defeat when they lost 2-1 at Hoffenheim on Sunday as one of Germany's biggest clubs made their worst start to a season....
